content: Hate it or not, it does open doors for designers looking to make a dent in the market . I did a linkedin redesign a long while back and the folks at LinkedIn reached out directly asking if I ever considered working for them. I passed on the offer as I wasn’t ready to move out west. Has the unsolicited redesign trend gone a little too far? Maybe… Do I think it should stop? Not really. Many apps who get targeted take note of said redesigns and use it for research and exploration. Mine got noticed. I’ll be honest and say I can’t stand the LinkedIn UX but it’s still nice to know my work made an impact. Just my 2 cents.
